com.cleo.lexicom.external

Class LexiComOutgoing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.lexicom.external.LexiComOutgoing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LexiComOutgoing
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    LexiComOutgoing is used for either outgoing file payload or outgoing stream payload. Refer to IActionController.put(String[],LexiComOutgoing[],String,java.util.Properties) or IMailboxController.receive(ILexiComIncoming,java.util.Properties,boolean).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
